item.title: Laura add a quote by Sara Zarr
item.description: ". . .There are certain people who come into your life, and leave a mark. . . Their place in your heart is tender; a bruise of longing, a pulse of unfinished business. Just hearing their names pushes and pulls at you in a hundred ways, and when you try to define those hundred ways, describe them even to yourself, words are useless." -- Sara Zarr

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jim Morrison
item.description: "I think of myself as an intelligent, sensitive human being with the soul of a clown which always forces me to blow it at the most important moments." -- Jim Morrison

item.title: Laura add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "If we couldn't laugh we would all go insane." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Laura add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "I think the only way to get through this life is laughing hard and constantly, mostly at myself." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Laura add a quote by Billy Joel
item.description: "Iâ€™d rather laugh with the sinners than cry with the saints, the sinners are much more fun." -- Billy Joel

item.title: Laura add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Laura add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Laura add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Laura add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Laura add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "A wise girl kisses but doesn't love, listens but doesn't believe, and leaves before she is left." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Laura add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Laura add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Laura add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Laura add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "My father taught me to work, but not to love it. I never did like to work, and I don't deny it. I'd rather read, tell stories, crack jokes, talk, laugh -- anything but work." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Laura add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "I'm saying that I'm a moody, insecure, narrow-minded, jealous, borderline homicidal bitch, and I want you to promise me that you're okay with that, because it's who I am, and you're what I need." -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Laura add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Laura add a quote by Holly Black
item.description: "You are the only thing I have that is neither duty nor obligation, the only thing I chose for myself. The only thing I want. " -- Holly Black

item.title: Laura add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Hereâ€™s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Laura add a quote by Ilona Andrews
item.description: "Oh my God, she was retarded and I was going to kill Jim." -- Ilona Andrews

item.title: Laura add a quote by Elizabeth Wurtzel
item.description: "If you are chronically down, it is a lifelong fight to keep from sinking " -- Elizabeth Wurtzel

item.title: Laura add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Laura add a quote by Katherine Hepburn
item.description: "Most people are brought up to believe they are as good as the person next to them, I was told I was better." -- Katherine Hepburn

item.title: Laura add a quote by Sara Zarr
item.description: "Remember that no matter where I am or what I'm doing I've got a special place inside me that's all for you. It's been there since the day we met." -- Sara Zarr

item.title: Laura add a quote by Sara Zarr
item.description: "You were never what I wanted to forget." -- Sara Zarr

item.title: Laura add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Laura add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Laura add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Laura add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Laura add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.
